overview: Recently divorced, Rose and Josh live on their own as unemployed scriptwriters. Hired and invited in a sumptuous villa by a mysterious producer, they will have to compete against each other in order to finish a scenario by adding the most kinky sex scenes and the most thrilling adventure they could imagine. The one who will win will earn a big check and a renewed notoriety, while the other won't win nothing else than a the memory of few days in that idyllic place. Rivalry, kink and low blows will lead the ex-lovers two to write the hottest fantasies to win this wicked game.
title: The Scriptwriter
